ValidationRule.description: If one field on the Risk section is filled, you need to fill all the Risk fields
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISCHANGED(Risk_Categories__c) , ISCHANGED(Risk_Rating__c) , ISCHANGED(Risk_type__c) ), OR( AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Risk_Categories__c,'') , ISPICKVAL(Risk_Rating__c,'') , ISPICKVAL(Risk_type__c,'') ), NOT( AND( ISPICKVAL(Risk_Categories__c,'') , ISPICKVAL(Risk_Rating__c,'') , ISPICKVAL(Risk_type__c,'') ) ) ), AND( Risk_Subtotal__c >= VALUE($Label.OIF_Upside_and_Risk_Threshold), ISPICKVAL(Risk_Categories__c,''), ISPICKVAL(Risk_Rating__c,''), ISPICKVAL(Risk_type__c,'') ) ), $Profile.Name<>$Label.Data_Loader_Profile_Name, $Profile.Name<>$Label.System_Admin_Profile )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill "Risk Type", "Risk Rating" and "Risk Categories" fields at Risk Details
